web.secrets.passphraseComplexityRequired.text: Me whai i ngā pūmatua, pūiti, tau, me te tohu

web.secrets.theyll_appear_here_once_youv.text: Ka puta mai ki konei i te wā kua tuaritia e koe.

web.secrets.recipient_delivery_is_option.text: He kōwhiringa te tuku ki te kaiwhiwhi

web.secrets.sample_secret_content_this_c.text: Tauira ihirangi karere huna Ka taea tēnei te raraunga tairongo Ko tētahi karere maha-rārangi rānei

web.secrets.secret_content_copied_to_cli.text: Kua tāruatia te ihirangi karere huna ki te papatopenga

web.secrets.secret_value_not_available.text: Kāore e wātea te uara karere huna

web.secrets.you_can_safely_close_this_ta.text: Ka taea e koe te kati i tēnei matapihi ina oti.

web.secrets.enter_the_secret_content_her.text: Tāurua te ihirangi karere huna ki konei

web.secrets.enter_the_secret_content_to_.text: Tāurua te ihirangi karere huna hei tuari ki konei

web.secrets.when_ready_click_the_view_se.text: Ina reri, pāwhiri te pātene i te tihi o te whārangi hei whakaatu i tō karere kotahi-wā.

web.secrets.what_happens_next.text: He aha te mea e whai ake nei?

web.secrets.yes_after_viewing_the_secret.text: Āe. Whai muri i te tirohanga, ka mukua pūmautia te karere huna mai i ā mātou tūmau, kia whakaū i tō matatapu.

web.secrets.onetime_secret_is_a_secure_w.text: Ko Onetime Secret te huarahi haumaru ki te tuari i ngā mōhiohio tairongo e whakangaromia-anō whai muri i te tirohanga kotahi.

web.secrets.before_you_open_it_heres_wha.text: I mua i tō huaki, anei te mea me mōhio koe:

web.secrets.a_secure_one_time_message_aw.text: E tatari ana tētahi karere kotahi-wā, haumaru ki a koe.

web.secrets.auto_expire_after_viewing.text: Aunoa-pau whai muri i te tirohanga

web.secrets.that_information_is_no_longe.text: Kua tirohia, kua pau rānei tēnei karere huna.

web.private.this_msg_is_encrypted.text: Kua muhumuhua tēnei karere ki tō kupu karapa.

web.private.only_see_once.text: Kia tūpato: ka kitea tēnei kotahi anake.

web.private.created_success.text: Kua hangaia angitutia te karere huna!

web.private.created_success_key.text: Kua hangaia angitutia te karere huna {shortKey}!

web.private.created_securely.text: Kua hangaia haumaru tō karere huna

web.private.have_more_questions_visit_ou.text: He pātai anō? Toro ki tā mātou

web.private.the_burn_feature_lets_you_pe.text: Ko te āhuatanga whakawareware ka tuku i a koe ki te muku pūmau i tētahi karere huna i mua i te tirohanga o tētahi. He mea whai hua tēnei mēnā me whakakore te urunga, i tuari rānei i ngā mōhiohio hē. Ina whakawarekia, kāore e taea te whakahoki i te karere huna.

web.private.your_secret_will_remain_avai.text: Ka noho wātea tonu tō karere huna mō {0}, tae noa rānei ki te wā ka tirohia, ko tēhea e tae tuatahi ana. Whai muri i te tutuki o tētahi o ngā āhuatanga, ka mukua pūmautia te karere huna.

web.private.how_does_secret_expiration_w.text: Me pēhea te mahi o te paunga karere huna?

web.private.for_security_reasons_we_cant.text: Mō ngā take haumaru, kāore e taea e mātou te whakahoki mai i ngā hononga karere huna ngaro. Me waihanga e koe he karere huna hou, me hanga hoki he hononga hou. Ka tūtohu mātou kia tāruahia te hononga i te wā tonu i muri i te hanganga.

web.private.lost_your_secret_link.text: Kua ngaro tō hononga karere huna?

web.private.we_display_the_value_for_you.text: Ka whakaatu mātou i te uara ki a koe kia taea ai e koe te whakaū engari ka mahia kotahi tēnā, nō reira ki te whiwhi tētahi i tēnei whārangi tūmataiti (i tō hītori pūtirotiro, mehemea rānei ka tuku matapokorere koe i te hononga tūmataiti kaua ko te hononga karere huna), kāore rātou e kite i te uara karere huna.

web.private.why_can_i_only_see_the_secre.text: He aha ka kitea kotahi noa e au te uara karere huna?

web.private.burning_a_secret_permanently.text: Ko te whakawareware i tētahi karere huna ka muku pūmau i mua i te pānuitanga o tētahi. Ka kite te kaiwhiwhi i tētahi karere e tohu ana kāore te karere huna i te tīari. He mea whai hua tēnei mēnā ka tuari pohewa koe i ngā mōhiohio hē, me ārai rānei te urunga.

web.private.what_happens_when_i_burn_a_s.text: He aha ka puta ina whakawaretia e au tētahi karere huna?

web.private.and_never_stored_in_its_orig.text: ā, kāore i te rokiroki i tōna āhua taketake. Ko tēnei huarahi ko tō tikanga kāore e taea e mātou te uru, te whakahoki rānei i tō karere huna - ko te tangata anake me te kupu karapa tika ka taea.

web.private.each_secret_can_only_be_view.text: Ka taea te tiro kotahi noa ia karere huna. Whai muri i te tirohanga, ka mukua pūmautia mai i ā mātou tūmau. Ka whakaū tēnei kāore e kitea pokerehia ō mōhiohio tairongo mā te hītori pūtirotiro, mā ngā hononga tūmataiti hē rānei.

web.shared.requires_passphrase.text: Me whai kupu karapa tēnei karere:

web.shared.viewed_own_secret.text: Kua tirohia e koe tō ake karere huna. Kāore i te wātea mō tētahi atu.

web.shared.you_created_this_secret.text: Nāu i hanga tēnei karere huna. Ki te tirohia e koe, kāore e kite te kaiwhiwhi.

web.shared.reply_with_secret.text: Whakautu ki tētahi atu karere huna

web.shared.pre_reveal_default.text: Pāwhiri te pātene ki raro hei whakaatu i tō karere haumaru.

web.shared.post_reveal_default.text: Kei raro nei tō karere haumaru.
